p: For willingness to donate, we found that there was a significant three-way interaction [ G 2(4) = 12.37, p = 0.02]. However, we did not find a difference in the willingness to donate between liberals and conservatives in the temperature condition ( X 2 = 0.97, p = 0.32) or in the neutral condition ( X 2 = 2.65, p = 0.10) ( Table 1). The null results in donation could be driven by the fact that the donation question was hypothetical and no actual donations were made.
